comments.raw_text:
(Noticed while working locally on bug 544170.)

{
Error: [Exception... "Component returned failure code: 0x80004005 (NS_ERROR_FAILURE) [nsIWebNavigation.sessionHistory]"  nsresult: "0x80004005 (NS_ERROR_FAILURE)"  location: "JS frame :: chrome://global/content/bindings/browser.xml ::  :: line 663"  data: no]
Source File: chrome://global/content/bindings/browser.xml
Line: 670
}

Firefox 4.0*pre: once.
SeaMonkey 2.1*pre: twice.

Fwiw, I would try to guess that this test misses a stub/mock object/feature...
